title: Update domain references from jay-sports-puc.caffeine.xyz to www.jaysports.in

requirements.summary: Replace all occurrences of 'jay-sports-puc.caffeine.xyz' with 'www.jaysports.in' across frontend files including HTML meta tags, SEO tags, and any hardcoded URL strings
acceptanceCriteria: No occurrence of 'jay-sports-puc.caffeine.xyz' remains in any frontend file.
All Open Graph og:url and og:image tags in frontend/index.html reference 'https://www.jaysports.in'.
All Twitter Card and canonical URL tags reference 'https://www.jaysports.in'.
Google Analytics or any other tracking/config using the old domain is updated to 'www.jaysports.in'.
Any hardcoded domain strings in TSX/TS component files are updated to 'www.jaysports.in'.

file_operations.description: Replace all instances of 'jay-sports-puc.caffeine.xyz' with 'www.jaysports.in' in meta tags including Open Graph og:url and og:image tags, Twitter Card tags, canonical link tag, and any other references to the old domain. Ensure Google Analytics configuration uses the new domain if present.
Search for and replace any hardcoded references to 'jay-sports-puc.caffeine.xyz' with 'www.jaysports.in' if present in URL strings or configuration.
Search for and replace any hardcoded references to 'jay-sports-puc.caffeine.xyz' with 'www.jaysports.in' if present in URL strings, links, or text content.
Search for and replace any hardcoded references to 'jay-sports-puc.caffeine.xyz' with 'www.jaysports.in' if present in routing configuration or URL strings.
Search for and replace any hardcoded references to 'jay-sports-puc.caffeine.xyz' with 'www.jaysports.in' if present in navigation links or configuration.
Search for and replace any hardcoded references to 'jay-sports-puc.caffeine.xyz' with 'www.jaysports.in' if present in contact information or links.
Search for and replace any hardcoded references to 'jay-sports-puc.caffeine.xyz' with 'www.jaysports.in' if present in content text or links.
Search for and replace any hardcoded references to 'jay-sports-puc.caffeine.xyz' with 'www.jaysports.in' if present in component configuration or URL strings.
